about_the_game:
SpellTome is a story driven 2D adventure platformer set in a fantasy world. You will explore a lakeside castle, navigate it's corridors and floors, dodge traps and fight magically animated weapons, armor, and more. The game follows our magic blinded protagonist on their path to steal, ehem, borrow the fabled SpellTome and uncover it's magic secrets.

Disclaimer: The Demo version of the game was done with Unity. Due to recent issues regarding the monetization and fees owed to Unity by indie developers we have decided to change the game engine to Godot. This change will revert most of our progress that we have done on the game so far, however we did not want to waste what we had. Please download and try this game in this unfinished state and let us know your thoughts on our email or social media accounts.


DODGE DEADLY ENEMIES

SCALE DIFFERENT PLATFORMS

FIRE SPELLS!

EVADE TRAPS!

What is Unique about SpellTome?
SpellTome is different to other platformers by using a combination of mouse and keyboard to deliver fast and precise combat. The other defining feature is the complete lack of melee weapons. As the game is based on the story of a wizard the game doesn't feature melee combat, since we all know that wizards don't do knives.

FEATURES:
-Different endings depending on your skill and detective abilities.
-Multiple randomly selected levels allow replayability while keeping the polish of hand made levels
-Difficult enemies
-Platforming levels
-Boss encounters
-Custom sound design
-Environmental story telling
-Fast and sweet gameplay that will hopefully tickle your imagination

Will you be able to unravel the secrets of this ancient castle now wizarding vault?
